data.name: C.H.A.O.S.
data.detailed_description:
control echo operator, a combat assistant droid that is made for highly dangerous encounters and join the C.H.A.O.S. team , a team of highly skilled Private Military Contractors who specialize in difficult missions, they are the Combat Heavy Advanced Operations Squad. follow the downfall of the C.H.A.O.S. team when greed comes into the play.

the game is VR rail shooter inspired by classic arcade rail shooters, that integrates the reaction speed and fun of the arcades and brings the movement and freedom of Virtual Reality. the game also has a energetic soundtrack provided by UAMEE.

In this game: You shoot down enemies and after you have shot down every enemy you progress to a next area. If you have progressed till the end of the level there will be display showing your time and score. Currently the game has one level but we plan to release three levels.

In this game: You shoot down enemies and after you have shot down every enemy you progress to a next area. If you have progressed till the end of the level there will be display showing your time and score. Currently the game has one level but we plan to release three levels.
data.short_description: The game is an VR railshooter based on the classic arcade railshooter with some VR features.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9750H CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR headset required
